snippet: To Armenian-Americans, the display Tuesday of a hand-woven rug at the White House Visitor's Center represented a hard-fought victory in their push for official recognition of the killings of their ancestors experienced nearly a century ago....

headline.print_headline: Symbol of Century-Old Suffering Gets Brief Display
headline.main: Symbol of Century-Old Suffering Gets Brief Display

lead_paragraph: To Armenian-Americans, the display Tuesday of a hand-woven rug at the White House Visitor's Center represented a hard-fought victory in their push for official recognition of the killings of their ancestors experienced nearly a century ago.
